title: Certain letters written to severall persons
author: Capel of Hadham, Arthur Capel, Baron, 1610?-1649.
notes: Attributed to Arthur Capel. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in  Huntington Library.
"A letter to Mr. E.S. from a reverend and grave divine [i.e., George Morley, afterwards Bp. of Winchester]": p. 43-47.
